definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
to walk (side part of split character)
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
to bring about/to create/to cause
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to manufacture/to make
to transform/to reform/to remodel/to remold
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
to model/to shape/appearance/style/design/form/pose
manufacturing industry
to build (housing)/to construct/to make
to construct/to build
manufacturing company
to model/to mold/(fig.) to create (a character, a market, an image etc)/(literature) to portray (in words)
to forge/to fake/to counterfeit
to bring up/to train/to contribute to/achievements (usually of young people)
to counterfeit/to pass off a fake as genuine
creativeness/creativity

sentences.english: Building offside tactics is one kind when use regulation and design defends tactics.
sentences.chinese: 造越位戰術是利用規則而設計的一種防守戰術。

sentences.english: So who made the machines? That's who we want to contact.
sentences.chinese: 那誰造的這種機器？我們要和他接觸。

sentences.english: They built a crane capable of lifting 150 tons.
sentences.chinese: 他們造了一臺能吊起150噸重量的吊車。

sentences.english: This machine was made by Uncle Wang .
sentences.chinese: 這臺機器是王叔叔造的。

sentences.english: There are several vacant plots available for building on in the area.
sentences.chinese: 那個地區還有好幾塊空地皮可以用來造房子。

sentences.english: In the Most Holy Place he made a pair of sculptured cherubim and overlaid them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 在至聖所按造像的法子造兩個基路伯，用金子包裹。

sentences.english: As Soviets you should skip Twinblades for harassment and instead go for Kirovs.
sentences.chinese: 作爲蘇軍，你應該跳過雙刃騷擾的步驟轉而造基洛夫。

sentences.english: Constructing a brightly colored nest works wonders for the bowerbird.
sentences.chinese: 造一個色彩明亮的巢會在園丁鳥中產生奇妙的作用。

sentences.english: They immediately started trying for a family after their wedding but nothing had happened after six months.
sentences.chinese: 婚後二人立即開始造人計劃，但六個月後依然無果。

sentences.english: And in the most holy house he made two cherubims of image work, and overlaid them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 在至聖所按造像的法子造兩個基路伯，用金子包裹。

sentences.english: McCamey is quite adept at penetration and getting the foul calls near the basket.
sentences.chinese: 麥卡密擅長突破以及在籃筐附近造犯規。

sentences.english: He spared no expense in building a villa for himself.
sentences.chinese: 他不惜工本爲自己造了一幢別墅。

sentences.english: He was not happy when he saw the three little pigs building houses nearby.
sentences.chinese: 他看到三隻小豬在附近造房子，感到很不開心。

sentences.english: Of course, doors were made for people to pass through;
sentences.chinese: 當然，門是造了讓人出進的。

sentences.english: I hope China can come up with something to put Apple out of business.
sentences.chinese: 我希望中國可以造出點什麼東西能把蘋果趕出市場。

definition: to manufacture/to make
to copy/to produce sth after a model/to counterfeit
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to construct/to build

to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
forty-third year C7 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1966 or 2026
to build/to repair
fortieth year J4 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1963 or 2023
37th year G1 of the 60-year cycle, e.g. 1960 or 2020
to imitate
41st year A5 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1964 or 2024
forty-seventh year G11 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1970 or 2030
craftsman

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
second part/the equinox
